/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban buildings that flank it. Power lines crisscross above, forming a complex web against the clear blue sky. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
